name: Grandma's Arboretum
description:
Visiting the arboretum your grandmother loved so much, you find she's left you a message between the potted plants ...and tricks of the light.

A detailed explorable environment created to impress specific emotions and aesthetics on the player. Will take just a few minutes to cover.

This project uses A LOT of assets created by others, with the vast majority acquired through the Unity Asset Store. For the full length credits and links to each one, please see the READ ME file.
